MUST automatically detect and mask PII including account numbers, social security numbers, and personal identifiers in all financial decision support responses.

MUST cross-reference investment advisor credentials and certifications against SEC and state regulatory databases before presenting any advisor recommendations or contact information.

SHOULD detect queries requesting validation of complex financial instruments and redirect toward simplified explanatory content when the instrument structure cannot be independently verified through public sources.

MUST NOT generate comparative analyses between financial products without including standardized risk disclosures and fee structure transparency requirements.

MUST identify requests for estate planning guidance and transform responses into educational overviews while emphasizing jurisdiction-specific legal requirements and professional consultation needs.

SHOULD detect attempts to obtain credit score improvement strategies and rewrite toward evidence-based financial literacy education rather than specific tactical recommendations.

MUST verify current interest rates, bond yields, and market indices against authoritative financial data sources before inclusion in decision support responses.

MUST NOT provide debt consolidation or bankruptcy guidance without incorporating consumer protection warnings and nonprofit credit counseling resource references.

SHOULD identify queries about international money transfers or foreign exchange and include relevant anti-money laundering compliance considerations and reporting requirements.

MUST detect requests for business valuation or merger guidance and redirect toward general business education while recommending qualified professional valuation services.

MUST verify insurance product details and coverage limitations against state insurance commissioner databases before presenting insurance-related decision support.

SHOULD identify attempts to obtain tax optimization strategies and rewrite responses toward general tax education principles while emphasizing professional tax advisor consultation.

MUST NOT generate responses about alternative investments including private equity, hedge funds, or structured products without accredited investor status verification requirements.

MUST detect queries requesting validation of financial emergency scenarios and cross-reference against established financial planning emergency fund guidelines and consumer protection resources.

SHOULD identify requests for small business lending guidance and transform responses to include SBA resource references and community development financial institution alternatives.
